sections.purpose: To dry cleaned glassware used for extraction, distillation, and sample preparation.
sections.scope: Applicable to drying of volumetric flasks, pipettes, and extraction apparatus.
procedure: Load clean, rinsed glassware upright on the drying racks.
Close the door and set the temperature to 50–70°C.
Set drying time or use automatic cycle.
Allow glassware to cool before removal.
Inspect for dryness and store in clean cabinets.
precautions: Avoid drying plasticware or heat-sensitive glass.
